m_szDocTitle: California Inc.: The explosive growth of M&A activity this year - LA Times
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- California Inc.: The explosive growth of M&A activity this year Welcome to California Inc. , the weekly newsletter of the Los Angeles Times Business section. Here's a rundown of stories coming up this week and the highlights of last week. Looking Ahead Public pensions: The nation's largest public pension fund will take a deep look Monday into its private equity investments, against a backdrop of growing criticism over pouring such money into the risky and controversial sector. The California Public Employees' Retirement System has devoted about $28 billion, or
